TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProgressBar extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: Represents a Windows progress bar control.

span.span: Represents a Windows progress bar control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項以視覺化方式表示在三種樣式的其中一個長時間作業的進度：A control visually indicates the progress of a lengthy operation in one of three styles: - 在步驟從左到右增加的分段的區塊。Segmented blocks that increase in steps from left to right. - 連續的列，填入從左到右。A continuous bar that fills in from left to right. - 透過捲動的目標區塊跑馬燈方式。A block that scrolls across a in a marquee fashion. 屬性決定的樣式顯示。The property determines the style of that is displayed. 請注意，控制項只能導向水平。Note that the control can only be oriented horizontally. 如需如何建立垂直方向的範例，請參閱類別。For an example of how to create a vertically oriented , see the class. 控制項通常用於應用程式在執行工作，例如將檔案複製或列印文件。The control is typically used when an application performs tasks such as copying files or printing documents. 應用程式的使用者可能會考慮應用程式沒有回應，如果沒有視覺提示。Users of an application might consider an application unresponsive if there is no visual cue. 使用在您的應用程式，警示使用者應用程式正在執行長時間工作和應用程式是否仍有回應。By using the in your application, you alert the user that the application is performing a lengthy task and that the application is still responding. 和屬性會定義範圍的值代表工作的進度。The and properties define the range of values to represent the progress of a task. 屬性通常會設定為值 0，而屬性通常設定為值，表示工作完成。The property is typically set to a value of 0, and the property is typically set to a value indicating the completion of a task. 例如，若要複製的檔案群組時，適當地顯示進度屬性無法複製設定為的檔案總數。For example, to properly display the progress when copying a group of files, the property could be set to the total number of files to be copied. 屬性表示應用程式已完成此作業的進度。The property represents the progress that the application has made toward completing the operation. 所顯示的值只近似的目前值屬性。The value displayed by the only approximates the current value of the property. 根據大小、屬性會決定何時顯示下一個區塊，或增加此橫條的大小。Based on the size of the , the property determines when to display the next block or increase the size of the bar. 有數種方式來修改顯示的值以外變更直接屬性。There are a number of ways to modify the value displayed by the other than changing the property directly. 您可以使用屬性來指定要遞增的特定值屬性，然後再呼叫方法，以遞增的值。You can use the property to specify a specific value to increment the property by, and then call the method to increment the value. 若要變化的遞增值，您可以使用方法並指定用來遞增值屬性。To vary the increment value, you can use the method and specify a value with which to increment the property. > [!NOTE] > 和變更則不會遵照上啟用視覺化樣式時[!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)]和更新版本。 and changes for the will not be honored when visual styles are enabled on [!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)] and above. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用控制項來顯示檔案複製作業的進度。The following code example uses a control to display the progress of a file copy operation. 此範例會使用和屬性，以指定的範圍也就是要複製的檔案數字相等。The example uses the and properties to specify a range for the that is equivalent to the number of files to copy. 程式碼也會使用屬性方法，以遞增的值在複製檔案。The code also uses the property with the method to increment the value of the as a file is copied. 這個範例需要您有建立呼叫控制項`pBar1`內建立，而且沒有方法建立呼叫`CopyFile`（會傳回布林值，指出檔案複製作業已順利完成），以執行檔案複製作業。This example requires that you have a control created called `pBar1` that is created within a and that there is a method created called `CopyFile` (that returns a Boolean value indicating the file copy operation was completed successfully) that performs the file copy operation. 程式碼也需要建立和傳遞給包含要複製的檔案的字串陣列`CopyWithProgress`範例中定義的方法，並從另一個方法或事件中的呼叫方法。The code also requires that an array of strings containing the files to copy is created and passed to the `CopyWithProgress` method defined in the example and that the method is called from another method or event in the . [!code-cpp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Increment(int32 value) cil managed

param.name: value
param.span: The amount by which to increment the progress bar's current position.

span.span: The amount by which to increment the progress bar's current position.

summary.span: Advances the current position of the progress bar by the specified amount.

span.span: Advances the current position of the progress bar by the specified amount.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您根據特定的數量遞增進度列的值。The method enables you to increment the value of the progress bar by a specific amount. 這個方法是會遞增進度列，類似於使用屬性方法。This method of incrementing the progress bar is similar to using the property with the method. 屬性會指定目前的位置。The property specifies the current position of the . 如果在呼叫方法，屬性的值大於屬性，屬性的值會保持屬性。If, after calling the method, the property is greater than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property. 如果在呼叫含有負值中指定的方法`value`參數，屬性小於的值屬性，屬性保持在值屬性。If, after calling the method with a negative value specified in the `value` parameter, the property is less than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property. 因為物件設定其樣式為顯示持續捲動列，而不是其，則呼叫是不必要的且會引發。Because a object whose style is set to displays a continuously scrolling bar instead of its , calling is unnecessary and will raise an . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法和屬性的值遞增中事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method and the property to increment the value of a in the event of a . 此範例也會顯示屬性提供的文字表示法。The example also displays the property in a to provide a textual representation of the . 這個範例需要您有控制項，名為`progressBar1`，和包含控制項具名`statusBarPanel1`。This example requires that you have a control, named `progressBar1`, and a control that contains a , named `statusBarPanel1`. 具名`time`，必須以成員形式加入。The , named `time`, must be added to the form as a member. [!code-cpp[ProgressBar.Increment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBar.Increment/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ProgressBar.Increment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBar.Increment/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ProgressBar.Increment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBar.Increment/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MarqueeAnimationSpeed { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MarqueeAnimationSpeed : int with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the time period, in milliseconds, that it takes the progress block to scroll across the progress bar.

span.span: Gets or sets the time period, in milliseconds, that it takes the progress block to scroll across the progress bar.

value.span: 進度區塊捲動完整個進度列所需的時間長度 (以毫秒為單位)。

span.span: The time period, in milliseconds, that it takes the progress block to scroll across the progress bar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 跑馬燈樣式的進度列指示器不會顯示進度。而是它會指出發生作業的進度區塊移動個進度列。A marquee-style progress indicator does not display progress; instead it indicates that an operation is occurring by moving the progress block across the progress bar. 因為跑馬燈動畫的速度是一段時間的值設定為較高數字會導致較慢的速度及較低數字會導致更快的速度。Since the marquee animation speed is a time period, setting the value to a higher number results in a slower speed and a lower number results in a faster speed.

exception.span: The indicated time period is less than 0.

span.span: The indicated time period is less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Maximum { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Maximum : int with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the maximum value of the range of the control.

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum value of the range of the control.
The maximum value of the range.
The default is 100.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性指定的上限屬性。This property specifies the upper limit of the property. 當值屬性變更，以反映新的控制項範圍重繪控制項時。When the value of the property is changed, the control is redrawn to reflect the new range of the control. 當值屬性的值等於完全填滿屬性，進度列。When the value of the property is equal to the value of the property, the progress bar is completely filled. 您可以使用這個屬性指定的值屬性必須設定 (藉由設定屬性，或使用或方法) 來表示作業已完成。You can use this property to specify a value to which the property must be set (by setting the property or using the or methods) to indicate that an operation is complete. 例如，您可以設定的值檔案複製作業中的檔案總數的屬性。For example, you can set the value of the property to the total number of files in a file copy operation. 複製檔案時，每次屬性可以增加 1，直到複製的檔案總數。Each time a file is copied, the property can be increased by 1 until the total number of files is copied. 此時，會完全填入進度列。At that point, the progress bar would be completely filled. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用控制項來顯示檔案複製作業的進度。The following code example uses a control to display the progress of a file copy operation. 此範例會使用和屬性，以指定的範圍也就是要複製的檔案數字相等。The example uses the and properties to specify a range for the that is equivalent to the number of files to copy. 程式碼也會使用屬性方法，以遞增的值在複製檔案。The code also uses the property with the method to increment the value of the as a file is copied. 這個範例需要您有建立呼叫控制項`pBar1`內建立，而且沒有方法建立呼叫`CopyFile`（會傳回布林值，指出檔案複製作業已順利完成），以執行檔案複製作業。This example requires that you have a control created called `pBar1` that is created within a and that there is a method created called `CopyFile` (that returns a Boolean value indicating the file copy operation was completed successfully) that performs the file copy operation. 程式碼也需要建立和傳遞給包含要複製的檔案的字串陣列`CopyWithProgress`範例中定義的方法，並從另一個方法或事件中的呼叫方法。The code also requires that an array of strings containing the files to copy is created and passed to the `CopyWithProgress` method defined in the example and that the method is called from another method or event in the . [!code-cpp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/VB/form1.vb#1)]

exception.span: The value specified is less than 0.

span.span: The value specified is less than 0.

summary.span: Gets or sets the minimum value of the range of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性指定的下限屬性。This property specifies the lower limit of the property. 當值屬性變更，以反映新的控制項範圍重繪控制項時。When the value of the property is changed, the control is redrawn to reflect the new range of the control. 當值屬性的值等於屬性，進度列是空的。When the value of the property is equal to the value of the property, the progress bar is empty. 若要變更進度列的值，請使用屬性方法，請使用方法，或設定值直接屬性。To change the value of the progress bar, use the property with the method, use the method, or set the value of the property directly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用控制項來顯示檔案複製作業的進度。The following code example uses a control to display the progress of a file copy operation. 此範例會使用和屬性，以指定的範圍也就是要複製的檔案數字相等。The example uses the and properties to specify a range for the that is equivalent to the number of files to copy. 程式碼也會使用屬性方法，以遞增的值在複製檔案。The code also uses the property with the method to increment the value of the as a file is copied. 這個範例需要您有建立呼叫控制項`pBar1`內建立，以及是否有一種方法建立呼叫`CopyFile`（會傳回布林值，指出檔案複製作業已順利完成），以執行檔案複製作業。This example requires that you have a control created called `pBar1` that is created within a , and that there is a method created called `CopyFile` (that returns a Boolean value indicating the file copy operation was completed successfully) that performs the file copy operation. 程式碼也需要建立和傳遞給包含要複製的檔案的字串陣列`CopyWithProgress`在範例中，定義方法，並從另一個方法或事件中的呼叫方法。The code also requires that an array of strings containing the files to copy is created and passed to the `CopyWithProgress` method defined in the example, and that the method is called from another method or event in the . [!code-cpp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PerformStep() cil managed

summary.span: Advances the current position of the progress bar by the amount of the property.

span.span: Advances the current position of the progress bar by the amount of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法遞增進度列的值所指定的數量屬性。The method increments the value of the progress bar by the amount specified by the property. 您可以使用屬性來指定在作業中每個已完成的工作進度列的值變更的數量。You can use the property to specify the amount that each completed task in an operation changes the value of the progress bar. 比方說，如果您要複製的檔案群組中，您可能想要設定的值1 的值屬性屬性来複製的檔案總數。For example, if you are copying a group of files, you might want to set the value of the property to 1 and the value of the property to the total number of files to copy. 每個檔案複製時，您可以呼叫方法來遞增進度列的值來屬性。When each file is copied, you can call the method to increment the progress bar by the value of the property. 如果您想要擁有更有彈性之值的進度列控制項，您可以使用方法設定的值或直接屬性。If you want to have more flexible control of the value of the progress bar, you can use the method or set the value of the property directly. 屬性會指定目前的位置。The property specifies the current position of the . 如果在呼叫方法，屬性的值大於屬性，屬性的值會保持屬性。If, after calling the method, the property is greater than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property. 如果在呼叫含有負值中指定的方法、屬性小於的值屬性，屬性的值會保持屬性.If, after calling the method with a negative value specified in , the property is less than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property. 因為物件設定其樣式為顯示持續捲動列，而不是其，則呼叫是不必要的且會引發。Because a object whose style is set to displays a continuously scrolling bar instead of its , calling is unnecessary and will raise an . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用控制項來顯示檔案複製作業的進度。The following code example uses a control to display the progress of a file copy operation. 此範例會使用和屬性，以指定的範圍也就是要複製的檔案數字相等。The example uses the and properties to specify a range for the that is equivalent to the number of files to copy. 程式碼也會使用屬性方法，以遞增的值在複製檔案。The code also uses the property with the method to increment the value of the as a file is copied. 這個範例需要您有建立呼叫控制項`pBar1`內建立，以及是否有一種方法建立呼叫`CopyFile`（會傳回布林值，指出檔案複製作業已順利完成），以執行檔案複製作業。This example requires that you have a control created called `pBar1` that is created within a , and that there is a method created called `CopyFile` (that returns a Boolean value indicating the file copy operation was completed successfully) that performs the file copy operation. 程式碼也需要建立和傳遞給包含要複製的檔案的字串陣列`CopyWithProgress`在範例中，定義方法，並從另一個方法或事件中的呼叫方法。The code also requires that an array of strings containing the files to copy is created and passed to the `CopyWithProgress` method defined in the example, and that the method is called from another method or event in the . [!code-cpp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ProgressBar1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ProgressBar1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#519](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#519)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#519](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#519)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性來指定在作業中每個已完成的工作進度列的值變更的數量。You can use the property to specify the amount that each completed task in an operation changes the value of the progress bar. 比方說，如果您要複製的檔案群組中，您可能想要設定的值1 的值屬性屬性来複製的檔案總數。For example, if you are copying a group of files, you might want to set the value of the property to 1 and the value of the property to the total number of files to copy. 每個檔案複製時，您可以呼叫方法來遞增進度列的值來屬性。When each file is copied, you can call the method to increment the progress bar by the value of the property. 如果您想要擁有更有彈性之值的進度列控制項，您可以使用方法設定的值或直接屬性。If you want to have more flexible control of the value of the progress bar, you can use the method or set the value of the property directly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用控制項來顯示檔案複製作業的進度。The following code example uses a control to display the progress of a file copy operation. 此範例會使用和屬性，以指定的範圍也就是要複製的檔案數字相等。The example uses the and properties to specify a range for the that is equivalent to the number of files to copy. 程式碼也會使用屬性方法，以遞增的值在複製檔案。The code also uses the property with the method to increment the value of the as a file is copied. 這個範例需要您有建立呼叫控制項`pBar1`內建立，以及是否有一種方法建立呼叫`CopyFile`（會傳回布林值，指出檔案複製作業已順利完成），以執行檔案複製作業。This example requires that you have a control created called `pBar1` that is created within a , and that there is a method created called `CopyFile` (that returns a Boolean value indicating the file copy operation was completed successfully) that performs the file copy operation. 程式碼也需要建立和傳遞給包含要複製的檔案的字串陣列`CopyWithProgress`在範例中，定義方法，並從另一個方法或事件中的呼叫方法。The code also requires that an array of strings containing the files to copy is created and passed to the `CopyWithProgress` method defined in the example, and that the method is called from another method or event in the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 最小和最大值的屬性所指定的和屬性。The minimum and maximum values of the property are specified by the and properties. 這個屬性可讓您增加或減少進度列直接的值。This property enables you to increment or decrement the value of the progress bar directly. 若要執行中的值一致增加控制項，您可以使用屬性方法。To perform consistent increases in the value of the control you can use the property with the method. 若要增加不同數量的進度列的值，請使用方法。To increase the progress bar value by varying amounts, use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法和屬性的值遞增中事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method and the property to increment the value of a in the event of a . 此範例也會顯示屬性提供的文字表示法。The example also displays the property in a to provide a textual representation of the . 這個範例需要您有控制項，名為`progressBar1`，和包含控制項具名`statusBarPanel1`。This example requires that you have a control, named `progressBar1`, and a control that contains a , named `statusBarPanel1`. 具名`time`，必須以成員形式加入。The , named `time`, must be added to the form as a member. [!code-cpp[ProgressBar.Increment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBar.Increment/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ProgressBar.Increment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBar.Increment/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ProgressBar.Increment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBar.Increment/VB/form1.vb#1)]
